extendedInfo.description: Play the casual action defense game, MOLEHEART! The defense game that everyone loves is now here- Experience defense gaming on a whole different level! âSynopsisâ Underworld, the home of the moles... King Phillip had peacefully ruled the world for 30 years. Then one day, King Phillip succumbed to his sickness. His evil brother Stanton seized the opportunity to rebel against the king. Prince William, son of King Phillip, defeated Stanton and saved the Underworld. Stanton had retreated, but only to come back with the power of darkness to invade Underworld once again... You are Prince William. Your mission is to defend Underworld from Stanton's threat! âWhat is Moleheart?â 1. Play in Adventure Mode - Intriguing story progression with ally, hero and enemy bosses - Stories by different characters - 7 Chapters: total of 70 stages 2. Distinguished growth and class change system - 4 basic units and 3 hero units can change when reaching level 10 - Special skills are rewarded upon class changes 3. Skill systems to defend against powerful enemies - Different hero skills and regular kills: Damage/Summon/Supplement/Special Types 4. Strategy system of exciting battle action - Increased Crystal Tower's max health and crystal recovery speed - 10+ different strategies for effective battle action 5. Simple control methods that everyone can enjoy 6. Upgrade systems to solidify skills/strategies by leveling up 7. Different in-game systems for more excitement: betting, mission, drop items, warning, treasures and more! âââââââââââââââââââââ NEWS & EVENTS Website http://www.gamevil.com Facebook http://facebook.com/gamevil Twitter http://twitter.com/gamevil YouTube http://youtube.com/gamevil

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I actually quite like the controls of tapping the left/right screen to move.  After passing the game and finished the extra quest, I can\'t replay the maps except starting a new character.  Would be better if it allow replays of maps and add in hard or endless modes?
reviews.author: Chi Lau

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.comment: There are much better games out there that are the exact same game play.  Horrible controls and horrible graphics.  Looks and plays like a game from the 1970`s.  Avoid at all cost!
reviews.author: Neal Zimmerman

reviews.title: Not a bad game
reviews.comment: Its a pretty good game, although I struggled in the third mission but maybe that\'s because I suck. Either way looking forward to see how much better the game gets.
reviews.author: Mark B

reviews.title: sad
reviews.comment: when 10 minute i play this game, after that this game will force stop .. and i need to continue play again, please fix this .
reviews.author: Jeron Jeven

reviews.title: LENOVO A2107A-H
reviews.comment: It gets stuck and restarts when I try to upgrade TACTIC..
reviews.author: SAI KIRAN

reviews.title: please add
reviews.comment: I have completed this now so i would love to see more levels! great game! I don\'t know why people are saying you have to pay to advance! I didn\'t pay a penny and I\'ve completed it!
reviews.author: jodie matthews

reviews.title: Best game ever
reviews.comment: I mean this game is better than cartoon wars 2 and i am the ambasator and as beaing the ambasator i announce this game to be the best game ever
reviews.author: Jhon Trever

reviews.title: gamevil fan
reviews.comment: this game is one of the best i ve ever played .. well its not my type but i really enjoyed and wish that we get a new part :)
reviews.author: Mohannad Nairoukh

reviews.comment: Just downloaded so far so good. Good cartoonie graphics
reviews.author: Edgar munguia

reviews.title: Fun little game
reviews.comment: Fun but just like all the other defend castle games
reviews.author: Scotty Simmons

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.comment: I love playing moleheart its fun and keeps u striving to upgrade as each level gets increasingly more difficult. I am currently experiencing some problems with level 7. It keeps force closing so I started a new game and I do not have that problem.. could this be my phone or the game itself?
reviews.author: Drew Savage

reviews.title: Ehhh...
reviews.comment: Pretty average for a gamevil game...basically a dumbed down version of Ariel Wars.  Is the game SUPPOSED to be animated this way? Original Mario Bros had more animation for their sprites...\"moles\" are brown lumps with faces...I\'m not feeling it. Worst thing for me is you cannot replay beaten levels, which means I forsee myself getting stuck at somepoint...my recommendation: find a different game to play.
reviews.author: John Holmes

reviews.title: My money
reviews.comment: Crap game. Woke up and they billed be 9.99 for some gold. Then during the game it kicked me out to purchase more gold for money. Automatically! Updated:dec 6th. I had to play because well they MADE me play since they charged me. I look in my status and again... they auto took my money. Thats 20 dollars. I accidentally pressed gold and it kicked ne out to google play. I pressed BACK RIGHT AWAY and waited till i was out of google play to make sure i didnt buy anything. ... didnt work. I hate this game
reviews.author: John Lee

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Great time killer.
reviews.author: Gary Lo

reviews.title: Fix it
reviews.comment: Doesnt work on s2 ics 4.0.4 jus freezes
reviews.author: Daryl Burge

reviews.title: Cheapheart
reviews.comment: U would get 5 stars if u were not so cheap with the gold and not so pricey with the power ups and upgrades. Lighten up, guys. Other than that, cool game.
reviews.author: DAMON CAMPBELL

reviews.title: Fun game.
reviews.comment: I\'ve played the first few levels. And seems fun. I like the betting games after each level and the fact that the magic and crystals are two different meters that allow you to create units and use magic without sacrificing the other

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Just that pure fun

reviews.comment: Its ok ive played better but i will play it to find out what other characters there is i think it fun

reviews.comment: Pretty cool game.
